todoUsage: some task, or /todo LISTALL, or /todo DELETE some task, or /todo DELETEALL
notifyAtHoursLabel: Notify to-do items at designated hours
notifyAtHoursDescription: Separate multiple hour triggers by comma
notificationTimeZoneLabel: Time zone in which notification hour filter is evaluated
notifyIntervalLabel: Time interval between notifying to-do items
notifyIntervalDescription: x seconds, or y minutes, or z hours. See schedule syntax
